title: Spot goes to the farm
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Six fabulous stories featuring Spot, the world's favourite puppy. 1. "Spot goes to the farm" - Spot and his dad, Sam, visit a farm to find some baby animals. 2. "Spot stays overnight" - Spot stays overnight with his friend, Steve the Monkey, and almost forgets to take his teddy bear. 3. "Spot makes a cake" - Spot helps his mum Sally to make a cake for a fair. 4. "Spot goes to the park" - At the park, a friendly frog helps Spot find his ball. 5. "Spot finds a key" - Where does the key fit? Spot sets out on a search to discover the answer. 6. "Spot in the garden" - Spot has lots of fun helping his dad with the watering and mum with the vegie garden. Based on the book by Eric Hill.
